region.display_name: Select your Chargebee accountâ€™s data center
region.description: Find your data center by navigating to this link: https://app.chargebee.com/sites/select. Depending on which data center you belong to, your URL will load as follows: US - https://app.chargebee.com/sites/select, AU - https://app.au.chargebee.com/sites/select, EU - https://app.eu.chargebee.com/sites/select.
